name: Project Reality
description:
Project Reality is a fun local multiplayer shooter. It has two game modes Arcade which is a single player mode were you fight against white cubes that are trying to kill you! In the Multiplayer game mode you and up to 4 other players battle till there is one player standing. 

Controls:

Keyboard/Controller

  • Move- WASD/Right Stick
  • Aim- Mouse/Left Stick
  • Jump- Space/ A button
  • Shoot- Left click/ Right Trigger
  • (Arcade Mode only) Slow motion- Left Shift/ Left bumper
  • Exit- Escape or E/ Options

(None of the music used in this game is made by me)

[!This game may have bugs!]

Have Fun!!!!!!!
